            </div>
        </div>
          <!-- end of User Access -->
     


        <!-- GDSP Tab content -->
        <div class="panel panel-success panel-area" id="gdspli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading panel-header" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_GDSP" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseGDSP" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseGDSP" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                  <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> Genomic Data Sharing Plan </a>
                </h4>
            </div>

            <div aria-labelledby="heading_GDSP" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseGDSP" role="tabpanel">

                <div class="tab-content grey-border">
										<div>
                      A <b>Genomic Data Sharing Plan</b> provides information on the proposed research that will generate large-scale human and non-human genomic data for which the GDS policy applies.   
                      <span class="pull-right">    
 												<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm active" id="gdspBt" ng-click="createGDSP()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                  		</span>
                    </div>
                    <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 20px;" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Draft GDSPs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.tasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>

                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="3">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftGDSP" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="collapseGDSP"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.tasks | filter:searchDraftGDSP" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination.currentPage * c.pagination.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="c.editItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Edit
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="c.removeItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Remove
                                </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.tasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize17">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                            <select id="pageSize17" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination.currentSize = c.pagination.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination.currentSize < c.data.tasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage($index)">
                            <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                    <!-- submitted Table -->
                    <br/><br><br>
                    <div id="submittedTable" style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Submitted GDSPs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.submittedTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="7">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchSubmittedGDSP" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="submittedTable"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns1 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort1($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                                'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                              }">
                                  </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.submittedTasks | filter: searchSubmittedGDSP" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination1.currentPage * c.pagination1.currentSize &&
                                         $index < (c.pagination1.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination1.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.gdsp_id }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.principal_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.status }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">
                                <span ng-switch on='row.approval'>
                                  <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA review"  title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for SD Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA Review" title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA Approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-default><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" title="Request Submitted" Alt="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="SD Approved" title="SD Approved"/></span>
                                </span>
                            </td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.submitted_date}}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="viewItem(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  View
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="(row.approval == 'Waiting for PI Resubmit' || row.approval == 'Completed') && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' " ng-click="displayResubmit(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Resubmit
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' &&  row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="withdraw(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Withdraw
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="report(row.sys_id, row.gdsp_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                                  Export
                                </button>
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_orginId" value="{{ row.orginId}}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_num" value="{{ row.org_ticket_num }}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket" value="{{row.gdsp_id}}" />
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.submittedTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize18">
                              Items per page
                            </label>

                            <select id="pageSize18" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination1.currentSize = c.pagination1.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination1.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination1.pageSizes">
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination1.currentSize < c.data.submittedTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange1() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage1($index)">
                            <a href="">
                              {{ $index + 1 }}
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- end of GDSP -->
        <!-- IC Tab content ng-click='openIcQUestion()' -->
        <div class="panel panel-success panel-area" id="icli" style="display:none;" ng-show="orgType != 'nonhuman'">
            <div class="panel-heading panel-header" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_IC" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseIC" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#collapseIC" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                              <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> 
                              Institutional Certification
                            </a>
                </h4>
            </div>
            <div aria-labelledby="heading_IC" class="panel-collapse collapse" id="collapseIC" role="tabpanel">
                <div class="tab-content grey-border" id="IC">
                  <div>
                     An <b>Institutional Certification Memo certifies </b> that data submission and sharing is consistent with the informed consent of the study participants. 
                      <span class="pull-right">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm active" id="icBtn" ng-click="openIcQUestion()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>
                      </span>
                  </div>
                  <br/>
                  <div>
												<b>Institutional Certification Memo Clarifying Guidance</b> <br/>
                        More than one Institutional Certification Memo is required for research that began prior to August 31, 2015 (with and/or without consent [one memo for each instance]) and continued past August 31, 2015 when consent is mandatory.  
                    
                  </div>  
                  <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-top: 20px;" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Draft ICs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.icTasks.length }}</span>
                    </div>
                    <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0 && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="8">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchDraftIC" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="collapseIC"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns2 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort2($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.icTasks | filter:searchDraftIC" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination2.currentPage * c.pagination2.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination2.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination2.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.study_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_title }}</td>
                            <!--td class="ritm_number">{{ row.certification_to }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.certification_from }}</td -->
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.gpa_organization }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sd_organization }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.sys_create_on }}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="viewICItem(row.sys_id, row.sampleTime, row.sampleConsent)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Edit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="c.removeItem(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Remove
                    </button>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.icTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize19">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize19" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination2.currentSize = c.pagination2.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination2.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination2.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination2.currentSize < c.data.icTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange2() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage2($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
 
                  <!-- IC submitted Table -->
                 <br/><br><br>
                 <div style="background-color: lightgrey; padding: 2px 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;" id="submittedICTable" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <h4 class="section-title">Submitted ICs</h4>
                        <span class="badge" style="color: #444; margin-left: 5px;" id="ritm_count">{{ c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length }}</span>
                 </div>
                 <table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed table-hover" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <td colspan="9">
                                    <form class="form-inline">
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control1" ng-model="searchSubmittedIC" placeholder="Search" aria-labelledby="submittedICTable"/>
                                    </form>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            <tr>
                                <th ng-repeat="column in c.columns4 track by $index" ng-click="c.toggleSort4($index)" style="cursor: pointer">
                                    {{ column.label }}
                                    <span class="glyphicon small" ng-class="{
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-up': column.sort === 'asc',
                                    'glyphicon-chevron-down': column.sort === 'desc'
                                  }">
                      </span>
                                </th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tr ng-repeat="row in c.data.icSubmittedTasks | filter:searchSubmittedIC" ng-show="$index >= c.pagination4.currentPage * c.pagination4.currentSize &&
                             $index < (c.pagination4.currentPage + 1) * c.pagination4.currentSize">
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.ic_id }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.study_name }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_title }}</td>
                            <!--td class="ritm_number">{{ row.issue_to }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.issue_from }}</td -->
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.status }}</td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">
                                <span ng-switch on='row.approval'>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA review"  title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Wait for PI to Sign'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for PI to sign"  title="Waiting for PI to sign"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>  
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for SD Review'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for GPA Review - SD Rejected'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for GPA Review" title="Waiting for GPA Review"/><img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Waiting for SD Review" title="Waiting for SD Review"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Waiting for PI Resubmit"  title="Waiting for PI Resubmit"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-when='SD Rejected - Waiting for PI Resubmit'><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA Approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="SD Rejected" title="SD Rejected"/><img src="/images/workflow_rejected.gifx" Alt="GPA Rejected" title="GPA Rejected"/></span>
                                <span ng-switch-default><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" title="Request Submitted" Alt="Request Submitted"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="GPA approved" title="GPA Approved"/><img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="SD Approved" title="SD Approved"/></span>
                                </span>
                            </td>
                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.submitted_date}}</td>
                            <td>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-click="viewSubmittedIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      View
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="(row.approval == 'Waiting for PI Resubmit' || row.approval == 'Completed') && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' " ng-click="displayICResubmit(row.sys_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Resubmit
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' && row.access == null && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="withdrawIC(row.sys_id, row.ic_id)" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Withdraw
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval != 'Completed' && c.data.access != 'Read_Only' && row.approval != 'Wait for PI to Sign'" ng-click="reportIC(row.sys_id, row.number, 'pi')" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Export
                    </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary active" ng-show="row.approval == 'Completed' && c.data.access != 'Read_Only'" ng-click="reportIC(row.sys_id, row.number, 'sd')" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">
                      Export
                    </button>

                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_orginId_ic" value="{{ row.orginId}}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_num_ic" value="{{ row.org_ticket_num }}" />
                                <input type="hidden" id="{{ row.sys_id }}_ticket_ic" value="{{row.ic_id}}" />
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <!-- select the page size -->
                    <form class="form-inline pull-right">
                        <div class="pagination form-group" ng-show="c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length > 0">
                            <label for="pageSize20">
                  Items per page
                </label>

                            <select id="pageSize20" class="form-control" style="display: inline" ng-init="c.pagination4.currentSize = c.pagination4.pageSizes[1]" ng-model="c.pagination4.currentSize" ng-options="sizes for sizes in c.pagination4.pageSizes">
                </select>
                        </div>
                    </form>

                    <!-- select the page index (offset) -->
                    <ul class="pagination" ng-show="c.pagination4.currentSize < c.data.icSubmittedTasks.length">
                        <li ng-repeat="index in c.getRange4() track by $index" ng-click="c.setPage4($index)">
                            <a href="">
                  {{ $index + 1 }}
                </a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- end of the IC tab createER() -->

        <!-- Exception Request Tab content  tempFunc   data-target="#collapseER"-->
        <!--
        <div class="panel panel-success panel-area" id="erli" style="display:none;">
            <div class="panel-heading panel-header" style="padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px;" id="heading_ER" role="tab">
                <h4 class="panel-title" style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;">
                    <a aria-controls="collapseER" aria-expanded="true" data-target="#" data-toggle="collapse" role="button">
                                  <span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-plus-square"></i></span> 
                                  Exception Request
                                </a>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary  btn-sm pull-right" id="erBtn" ng-click="createER()" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">NEW</button>

                            <td class="ritm_number">{{ row.project_name }}</td>

            </div>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>


<!--<div class="col-md-12"> </div>-->
<input type="hidden" id="hideGDSId" />
<input type="hidden" id="recId" />
<input type="hidden" id="access" />
<input type='hidden' id='refresh'/>
<input type='hidden' id='gdspStatus'/>
<input type='hidden' id='icStatus'/>


<div class="col-md-12"><label><a href='' class="home-link" ng-click='backToMain()'> Home    >   </a></label><span style="display:none;" id="titleButtomDiv"></span></div>

<!-- confirm modal -->
<div id="confirmDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                  <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
              </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="message"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesConfirmYesNo" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoConfirmYesNo" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="userConfirmDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                  <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
              </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageDeleteUser"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesConfirmUser" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoConfirmUser" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="withdrawDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageWithdraw"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesWithdraw" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoWithdraw" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="withdrawICDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageWithdrawIC"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesWithdrawIC" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button id="btnNoWithdrawIC" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div> 

<div id="infoModal" class="modal fade">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <!--button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button -->
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmOk" class="modal-title">Information</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageInfo"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnOkConfirm" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">OK</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="protocolInfoModal" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg"  style="width:1200px;">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <!--button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button -->
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmOk" class="modal-title">Information</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
              <p>
              Parent Protocols/Projects may be Tissue Procurement studies, OHRSP exemptions, or other umbrella projects in which multiple protocols/projects with different investigators are conducted under the umbrella protocol/project.  
              </p> 
              <div>
                <table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
                    <thead>
                        <tr>
                          <th scope="col" width="25%">Protocol Number</th>
                          <th scope="col" width="75%">Protocol Name</th>
                        </tr>
                    </thead>
                   <tbody>
                     <tr ng-repeat="item in c.protocols">
                     	<td>{{item.number}}</td>
                     	<td>{{item.name}}</td> 
                     </tr>
   											
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer" style="text-align: center">
                 <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">OK</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="loading" class="overlay" style="display:none;">
  <div class="spinner" style="width: 25px; height: 25px">
  	<svg version="2.0" class="spinner" width="25" height="25">
      <circle cx="12.5" cy="12.5" r="10" fill="transparent" stroke="#ccc" stroke-width="2.5" />
      <path fill="transparent" stroke="#666" stroke-width="2.5" d="M 12.5 2.5 a 10 10 0 0 1 10 10" />
    </svg>
  </div>
  <span>Processing</span>
</div>

<div id="addUserAccessDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">User Access</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                 <div class="row" id="error" style="display:none;"> </div>
                 <div class="row">
                     <div class="col-md-2">
                           <lable for="userName">User Name</lable>
                     </div>
                     <div class="col-md-6 ui-front">
                          <input type="text" class="form-control" id="userName" style="width:90%;" aria-labelledby="userName"/>
                          <input type='hidden' id='userFirstName' /><input type='hidden' id='userLastName' /><input type='hidden' id='userId' />
                     </div>
                     <div class="col-md-2">
                          Read-Write <input type="radio" name="access" value="Read_and_Write" aria-labelledby="userName"/>
                     </div>
                     <div class="col-md-2">
                          Read-only <input type="radio" name="access" value="Read_Only" aria-labelledby="userName" checked/>
                     </div>
								</div>                
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnAddUserAccess" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Add</button>
                <button id="btnCancelUserAccess" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Cancel</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div id="addParentGDSDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg"  style="width:900px; ">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                    <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
                </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">New GDS Parent</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                 <div class="row col-md-12" id="parentError" style="display:none;"> </div>
                 <div class="row">
 										<div class="col-md-3">
                      <font color='red'>*</font><label>Protocol Number</label>
                   </div>
                   <div class="col-md-9">
                     <input type="text" id="protocolNumber" class="form-control"/>
                   </div>
								</div>   
                <div class="row"> </div>
                <div class="row">
 										<div class="col-md-3">
                      <font color='red'>*</font><label>Protocol Name</label>
                   </div>
                   <div class="col-md-9">
                     <textarea id="protocolName" class="form-control" rows="3" ></textarea>
                   </div>
								</div>   
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" id="addNewProtocolBt">Add</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">Cancel</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div id="protocolConfirmDiv" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close">
                  <span aria-hidden="true">×</span>
              </button>
                <h4 id="lblTitleConfirmYesNo" class="modal-title">Confirmation</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <p align="center" id="messageProtocol"></p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="btnYesConfirmProcotol" type="button" class="btn btn-primary active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Yes</button>
                <button data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close" type="button" class="btn btn-default active" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">No</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>
